titleStmt.title: A true relation, of the proceedings against Iohn Ogiluie, a Iesuit, executed at Glasgow, the last of Februarie, anno 1615 Containing sundrie speeches vttered by him at his arraignment, and others, that assisted the commissioners deputed for his triall: with all that passed at his execution.
titleStmt.author: Spottiswood, John, 1565-1639, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
